entries.name: Awakened Shrub
entries.description: An awakened shrub is an ordinary shrub given sentience and mobility by the awaken spell or similar magic.

data.languages: one language known by its creator
data.traits: False Appearance. While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.
data.actions: Rake. Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) slashing damage.

entries.name: Baboon
entries.description: Baboons are aggressive primates that gather in troops.

data.traits: Pack Tactics. The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Badger
entries.description: A badger is a burrowing mammal with a fierce disposition.

data.traits: Keen Smell. The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Bat
entries.description: A bat is a small flying mammal that uses echolocation to navigate.

data.traits:
Echolocation. The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

Keen Hearing. The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Cat
entries.description: A small domesticated feline.

data.traits: Keen Smell. The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
data.actions: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

entries.name: Commoner
entries.description: Commoners include peasants, serfs, slaves, servants, pilgrims, merchants, artisans, and hermits.

data.actions: Club. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Crab
entries.description: A small crustacean with pincers.

data.traits: Amphibious. The crab can breathe air and water.
data.actions: Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Deer
entries.description: A graceful herbivore commonly found in forests and plains.

data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Eagle
entries.description: A bird of prey with keen eyesight.

data.traits: Keen Sight. The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
data.actions: Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Frog
entries.description: A small amphibian that can leap great distances.

data.traits:
Amphibious. The frog can breathe air and water.

Standing Leap. The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Giant Fire Beetle
entries.description: A giant fire beetle is a nocturnal creature that emits light from two glowing glands.

data.traits: Illumination. The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) slashing damage.

entries.name: Goat
entries.description: A domesticated livestock animal with horns.

data.traits:
Charge. If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Sure-Footed. The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
data.actions: Ram. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hawk
entries.description: A small bird of prey with exceptional eyesight.

data.traits: Keen Sight. The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
data.actions: Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

entries.name: Homunculus
entries.description: A homunculus is a construct created through alchemy to serve as a familiar or servant.

data.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
data.traits: Telepathic Bond. While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead poisoned for 5 (1d10) minutes and unconscious while poisoned in this way.

entries.name: Hyena
entries.description: A scavenging predator known for its laugh-like vocalizations.

data.traits: Pack Tactics. The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Jackal
entries.description: A small canine scavenger often found in packs.

data.traits:
Keen Hearing and Smell. The jackal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Pack Tactics. The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Lemure
entries.description: A lemure is a mindless, blob-like lesser devil.

data.traits:
Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the lemure's darkvision.

Hellish Rejuvenation. A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells comes back to life with all its hit points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.
data.actions: Fist. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Lizard
entries.description: A small reptile commonly found in warm climates.

data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Octopus
entries.description: An intelligent cephalopod with eight tentacles.

data.traits:
Hold Breath. While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Underwater Camouflage. The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

Water Breathing. The octopus can breathe only underwater.
data.actions:
Tentacles. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

entries.name: Owl
entries.description: A nocturnal bird of prey with silent flight.

data.traits:
Flyby. The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Keen Hearing and Sight. The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
data.actions: Talons. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

entries.name: Quipper
entries.description: A carnivorous fish with razor-sharp teeth, often found in swarms.

data.traits:
Blood Frenzy. The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

Water Breathing. The quipper can breathe only underwater.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Rat
entries.description: A common rodent found in cities and dungeons.

data.traits: Keen Smell. The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Raven
entries.description: A black bird known for its intelligence and ability to mimic sounds.

data.traits: Mimicry. The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.
data.actions: Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Scorpion
entries.description: An arachnid with a venomous stinger on its tail.

data.actions: Sting. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 9 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Sea Horse
entries.description: A small marine fish with a horse-like head.

data.traits: Water Breathing. The sea horse can breathe only underwater.
data.actions: The sea horse has no effective attacks.

entries.name: Shrieker
entries.description: A shrieker is a subterranean fungus that emits a loud shriek when disturbed.

data.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6
data.traits: False Appearance. While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.
data.reactions: Shriek. When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward.

entries.name: Spider
entries.description: A small eight-legged arachnid that spins webs.

data.traits:
Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

entries.name: Vulture
entries.description: A scavenging bird that feeds on carrion.

data.traits:
Keen Sight and Smell. The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

Pack Tactics. The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
data.actions: Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Weasel
entries.description: A small, agile carnivorous mammal.

data.traits: Keen Hearing and Smell. The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
data.actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
